Would you like to earn up to $50 worth of Amazon gift cards while contributing information that will be beneficial for all chapters of The Arc? Please visit our Tech Survey Challenge website (tech.thearc.org) and submit a survey about technology that is being used by individuals with I/DD at your chapter! Each survey takes less than 10 minutes and the information we are collecting will help inform The Arc about technology that is being used by people with I/DD and their support needs. We are accepting submissions indefinitely! Please reach out to <a href=“mailto:Lernihan@thearc.org”> Katy Lernihan Schmid</a> with any questions.
